function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced biodiversity and range of reservoir hosts impacting trypanosomiasis infection","Impact":"Increased infection in livestock and greater human transmission close to homesteads","Mitigation":"Conservation of forest ecosystems and responsible land use practices","Technologies":"Remote sensing and GIS for monitoring ecosystem health","People":"Livestock owners, local communities","Owner":"Environmental conservation organizations, local governments"},{"Description":"Inadequate access to improved sanitation and drinking water","Impact":"Facilitates vector-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improvement of sanitation infrastructure and access to clean drinking water","Technologies":"Water purification systems, wastewater treatment plants","People":"Communities with inadequate access to sanitation and clean water","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs"},{"Description":"Impacts of water developments on ecosystems and spread of vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Increased cases of malaria, schistosomiasis, and other infections","Mitigation":"Sustainable water development and management practices, ecosystem restoration","Technologies":"Hydrological modeling, water quality monitoring systems","People":"Communities affected by water-related development","Owner":"Water management authorities, environmental organizations"}]}
